full_summary:
# 6D063-225352 - Plumbing Maintenance Services

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4024323238
* **Publication Date**: May 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 16, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2028

## Tender Description

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) at Winnipeg, Manitoba, is seeking a contractor to provide plumbing maintenance services to its facilities on an as-required basis. The successful contractor will provide skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and material necessary for various types of plumbing services. It is anticipated that one firm will be issued a standing offer, valid for a period of five years.

## Scope of Work

The scope of work includes providing:

* Skilled licensed labor
* Tools
* Equipment
* Supervision
* Materials necessary for plumbing services

## Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded based on lowest price.

## Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity

The contract is available to Manitoba-based contractors.

## Contact Information

* Name: Mike Fagan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16393384?extsite=MTYzOTMzODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16393384?extsite=MTYzOTMzODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
